channel.title: MangoH operation when changing countries
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
We have created a system with a MangoH Yellow card to send a measurements on Octave. We're in France, the system works, and we need to send it to another country (first to New Zealand, but in the future we'll send it to other countries). Will the system continue to work, or do we need to modify the configuration for each country? If so, how do we change it?
Thanks in advance

item.title: MangoH operation when changing countries
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
then you might need to try if that SIM can register in other countries (I believe it should work in New Zeland, but you better double confirm with field test)

Read full topic

item.title: MangoH operation when changing countries
item.dc:creator: philippecarteron
item.description:
Hi jyijyi,

Thank you for your reply.
We use the Sim card integrated in the MangoH.

Read full topic

item.title: MangoH operation when changing countries
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
What sim card are you using?

Here says you need to set the APN

APN will recover when mangOH Yellow reboot mangOH Yellow
seems this is caused by clouldInterface application: root@swi-mdm9x28-wp:~# cm data Index: 1 APN: iot.swir PDP Type: IPV4V6 Connected: no root@swi-mdm9x28-wp:~# root@swi-mdm9x28-wp:~# cm data apn hkcsl root@swi-mdm9x28-wp:~# root@swi-mdm9x28-wp:~# app start cloudInterface root@swi-mdm9x28-wp:~# root@swi-mdm9x28-wp:~# cm data Index: 1 APN: iot.s…

Read full topic
